title: Help with frame freeze from new skill effect
body: I recently purchase prostar computer. so i installed league of legend and transfer all the file from my old computer to my new computer via usb. However i notice frame freeze whenever an effect pop up(champion skills)  or a something pops up like who kill who. Notice after the frame freeze(like 1-2sec)  from a skill then from that point on the same skill don't freeze me anymore. For example, Ashe's hawkeye shot freeze me for the first time, however, sequential hawkeye shot don't freeze me anymore.  But other skill do like ashe ultimate(first time).  So is there any software that is required?  anything that i need to do ? HELP PLZZ

replies.body:
Since you mentioned that you transferred all your game files via USB, my best guess is that some of the files got corrupted during the transfer. Let's make sure all of your game files are installed correctly by uninstalling and reinstalling the normal way (by downloading the installer and letting it do its thing). Here's a link to the normal [**download page**](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).

Hit me back up if this doesn't work for you!
i c i will try ur way first.
